me.lucko.helper

Interface Commands.CommandContext<T extends CommandSender>

  • Type Parameters:
    T - the sender type
    Enclosing class:
    Commands

    @NonnullByDefault
public static interface Commands.CommandContext<T extends CommandSender>
    Represents the context for a command call

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods Default Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      String getArg(int index)
      Gets the argument at the given index.
      default Optional<String> getArgIfPresent(int index)
      Returns a Optional containing the argument if present
      ImmutableList<String> getArgs()
      Gets an immutable list of the supplied arguments
      String getLabel()
      Gets the command label which was used to execute this command
      T getSender()
      Gets the sender who executed the command

      • getArg

        @Nullable
String getArg(int index)
        Gets the argument at the given index. Returns null if no argument is present at that index.
        Parameters:
        index - the index
        Returns:
        the argument, or null if one was not present
